content: Quando mi intrapreso il mio lungo vagabondaggio in quei deserti, c'erano strisce di terra nuda e noiosa alte tra i 1200 e i 1300 metri.
translations: eng:When I undertook my long wandering in those deserts, there were naked and boring stretches of land between 1200 and 1300
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by jacopofar (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
